1b1('bum): #/ shes rab kyang rol tu phyin pa stong drug brgya pa// pa
1b2('bum): ngo dud cu doran drug pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med
1b3('bum): phyir byeng chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa
2a1('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams
2a2('bum): dber pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i
2a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
2a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
2b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams
2b2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
2b3('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
2b4('bum): sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
2b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams
3a1('bum): med pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/
3a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams
3a3('bum): nga pa nyid kyang gzhanas yan/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhanam me/ ma lamamatsha ba nyid med pa yang gzhanas ya/ nga
3a4('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/
3a5('bum): no tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i
3a6('bum): khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
3b1('bum): gyi mtha' dang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
3b2('bum): chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dben
3b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir
3b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dri ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
3b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
3b6('bum): mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa'i nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
3b7('bum): chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i ru/ chu'i khams med pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid
4a1('bum): dang chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chu'i/
4a2('bum): khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// chu'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
4a3('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chu'i khar
4a4('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang
4a5('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
4a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
4a7('bum): me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams med/
4b1('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// de'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub
4b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
4b3('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dming
4b4('bum): so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de nI'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ me'i khams med pa dang / me'i
4b5('bum): khams stong pa nyid dang / me'i khams dben pa dang me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaphyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus su mi dmigs te/ me'i khams
4b6('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa
4b7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mo'i khams med pa
5a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
5a2('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
5a3('bum): rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i
5a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
5a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
5a6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
5a7('bum): so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung
5b1('bum): gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa tI'i bu/ rlung gi khams med pa dang / rlung gi khams spong ba/
5b2('bum): nyid dang ka rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ra'i mtha' mi dmyigs/ debus mi dmigs/ rlung gi khams med pa la
5b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
5b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rlung gi khams med pa
5b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
5b6('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
5b7('bum): ti'i bunam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso//
6a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nam mapa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi/
6a2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dper phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
6a3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa 'i bIr byang chub sems dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpar
6a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus
6a5('bum): su mi dmigs so// nam ma pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mo
6a6('bum): dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'i khams
6a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nam mkha'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
6b1('bum): mas ya shA y-i/ mamamam sa ldan pa'ang ma du ga y-i/ na sa
6b2('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi tha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gsan ma yi// dbus kyang gan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tin+ti d+ha/ de ltar na ya ra pa'i khabs med pa gang na
6b3('bum): dang shA nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang nam ma pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam ma pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
6b4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
6b5('bum): par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
6b6('bum): so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
6b7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
7a1('bum): dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i bIr byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa 'i dU
7a2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i kha
7a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
7a4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ka rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / rnam par dashes pa'i
7a5('bum): khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus
7a6('bum): mi dmigs te rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gan/
7a7('bum): ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
7b1('bum): ma yin pa dbus kyang gsan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar narnam par shes pa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang ga rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid drung
7b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / ljon
7b3('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / dri ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
7b4('bum): ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dang na/
7b5('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyidi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur mi dmigs so// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir
7b6('bum): byang chub sems dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
7b7('bum): sems dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i
8a1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
8a2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ga ma rig pa med pa/
8a3('bum): dang ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te ga ma rig pa/
8a4('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin pa ma rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
8a5('bum): yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pa dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu / de ltar na ma rig pa med pa gang yin pa dang
8a6('bum): ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
8a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
8b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ro
8b2('bum): dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyidi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du
8b3('bum): byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal phye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
8b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
8b5('bum): su mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i
8b6('bum): bIr rten patshe dang ldan par shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la / sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthara'
8b7('bum): mi dmigs pa dbus mi dmigs te / 'du byed med pa yang gzhan ma yin// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin pa 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin pa 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma
9a1('bum): i/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gsasam yin// sngon gyi mapa' yang bcan ma yin phyi ba'i mthar 'du gzhan pa yin / dbus pa gtsun pa rin no// medang rdzu
9a2('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang byang
9a3('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
9a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
9a5('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
9a6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar/
9a7('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
9b1('bum): rabams so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa dbus su mi dmigs so// nu par shes pa spyong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dngu dudus smra ma drugs so/
9b2('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi migs so// rnam par shes pa'i banyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi darigs so// de ci'i rlom
9b3('bum): den tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/ rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang pa rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon
9b4('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs pa phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / rnam par shes
9b5('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
9b6('bum): yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bug de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben
9b7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar gang yin pa dang / dbus pang
10a1('bum): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shU ra dwa ti'i bu ka ming dang gzugs pad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
10a2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming rang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
10a3('bum): dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
10a4('bum): so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
10a5('bum): ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming rang gzug
10a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
10a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ming dang gzugs med pa dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / ming dang gzugs dben pa dang /
10b1('bum): snying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs med pa 'ang gzhan pa yin/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan pa
10b2('bum): yin/ ming dang gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// ming rang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
10b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ming dang gzugs med pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs dben
10b4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag
10b5('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid
10b6('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
10b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
11a1('bum): dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
11a2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
11a3('bum): skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
11a4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug med pa dang skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug dben pa dang ga skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs pa phyi ma'i mtha'//
11a5('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te / skye mched drug med pa yang gzhan ma yin pa/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin pa skye mched drug dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid
11a6('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin pa sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
11a7('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye mched drug med pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa
11b1('bum): gang yin pa drung byang chub sems dpa' byung yin pa dang // sngon gyi dazla' gang yin pa dang / su m+bu'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad gang gnyis su med de gnas
11b2('bum): su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/ reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
11b3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
11b4('bum): rab pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
11b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
11b6('bum): so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
11b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na sa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ka reg pa med pa dang reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon
12a1('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin// reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// reg pa dben pa yang gzhan
12a2('bum): ma yin// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe
12a3('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
12a4('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
12a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i
12a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tsher ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
12a7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
12b1('bum): dmigs so// nor ba dzin pa med pa'i phyir byung chub sa nus dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba spyong pa
12b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
12b3('bum): dpa' dngos su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshe ba med pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tsher ba ngo ba nyid med pa la/ sbyin gyi mtha'
12b4('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gnan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan pa yin/ tshor ba ngo bo
12b5('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tsheng
12b6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyidi med pa gang yin pa dang / byung
12b7('bum): chub sems dpa' bang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
13a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
13a2('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
13a3('bum): so// sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa dben
13a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
13a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred
13a6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ka sred pa med pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang / sred pa dben pa dang /
13a7('bum): sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sred pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin// sred pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa
13b1('bum): dben pa yang gcan ma yin/ sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
13b2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sred pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa ngo
13b3('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthu' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su
13b4('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
13b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
13b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar po dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
13b7('bum): len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa med pa'i/
14a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir
14a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
14a3('bum): len pa med pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid dang ga len pa dben pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te ga len
14a4('bum): pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
14a5('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na len pa med pa gang yin pra dang /
14a6('bum): len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang galen pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
14a7('bum): dang daphyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa med pa'i phyir byang
14b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa stod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
14b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
14b3('bum): dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid
14b4('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi
14b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
14b6('bum): dbus su ma dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa med pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi
14b7('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ srid pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sri
15a1('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthar yang bzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
15a2('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na srid pa med pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa ngo ba nyi med pa gang
15a3('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
15a4('bum): med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
15a5('bum): skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub ser
15a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
15a7('bum): skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
15b1('bum): dnga' dum pa la rims so// rdzu ba ben pa'i phyir byang chubasams pa 'a ngas su ma dbas so// skye ba dad par ra byung chub sems dpar dras su ma rigs so//
15b2('bum): ra byen / tshe dang ldan par shA radwa ti du sgru ba med pa dang / skye bstong panyid dang / skye ba das pa dang / slo bango ba ny-id med pa la/ skyon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dri ba datha' mi dngogs dadus
15b3('bum): mi dmigs te/ rtse ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skyo ba dben pa yang gzhan pa yan+ti/ skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
15b4('bum): gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gnanu ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// de ltar na skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang /
15b5('bum): skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma
15b6('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/ rga shi zer ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
15b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
16a1('bum): rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
16a2('bum): rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
16a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
16a4('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
16a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/ rga shi med pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
16a6('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rga shi med pa yang gzhan ma yin// rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
16a7('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rga shi
16b1('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / rlu shi stong pa nyid bang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rba shing ba 'di med pa 'du yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ba yin pa dang / smyod gyi ngang byung /
16b2('bum): bdang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang // dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir
16b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sebs dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
16b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med
16b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i/
16b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
16b7('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
17a1('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de
17a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ston pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
17a3('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs te phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// dbus mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang /
17a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
17a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
17a6('bum): tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
17a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bu/ tshul khrims
17b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi spyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmi so// tshul
17b2('bum): zings kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
17b3('bum): pi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
17b4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/
17b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
17b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi
17b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa
18a1('bum): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi
18a2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
18a3('bum): yin na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin pa sngon gyi mtha'
18a4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ khyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / tshul
18a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
18a6('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
18a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
18b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par banyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi rigs so//
18b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma mthar mi dmigs so//
18b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ba'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ngo bzod med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpar phyi ma'i mthur mi dmigs so//
18b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod par
18b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
18b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa
18b7('bum): la na sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
19a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//
19a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang //
19a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
19a4('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA
19a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bubartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
19a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
19a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
19b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyo ba rol tu phyin pa stong tha~Md kyi phyir byung chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// banon 'azlas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpar phyir
19b2('bum): mthar pi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
19b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi
19b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyidri med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
19b5('bum): do ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ga brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
19b6('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigasapa dbus mi dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
19b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus
20a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo ba nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhanas
20a2('bum): yinadabus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe ngang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa
20a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
20a4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan
20a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
20a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
20a7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
20b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20b2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar pa dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam
20b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
20b4('bum): dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
20b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
20b6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam
20b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang
21a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthur yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
21a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
21a3('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / byasapa gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
21a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir
21a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol
21a6('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
21a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar/
21b1('bum): mi darig so// 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma migs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa dro bad me pa phyir drang chub sa pas dpa'
21b2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi rimibs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chubasapas dpa'
21b3('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
21b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyong pa da
21b5('bum): dang rishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te//
21b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma
21b7('bum): yin te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
22a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
22a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
22a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// /
22a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po don bdun pa// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
22a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
22a6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
22a7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
22b1('bum): dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
22b2('bum): darigs so// nang spostong ba'i dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so// nung stong pa nyid ba cad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dadus su mi dmigs so// den dzur
22b3('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i grwa/ nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la// sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi mo'i
22b4('bum): mtha' mi dmigs// dbus mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo
22b5('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA
22b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang zhang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa glang yin pa dang
22b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang len pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
23a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
23a2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
23a3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma
23a4('bum): dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
23a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i//
23a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
23a7('bum): ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' mi
23b1('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ phyi thong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi stong pa nyid ngo pa
23b2('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan pa yin no//
23b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang de phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong par
23b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad
23b5('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong
23b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang
23b7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
24a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
24a2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
24a3('bum): byin rtso pa nyi stong nyin kyi kyi byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid nga po rid med pa'i phyir byang chub
24a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang
24a5('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
24a6('bum): ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
24a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / khyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
24b1('bum): byi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bzod med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mdza'
24b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de drug thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
24b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
24b4('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
24b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
24b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
24b7('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
25a1('bum): bya/ sostong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid
25a2('bum): stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
25a3('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong
25a4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe/
25a5('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong
25a6('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
25a7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
25b1('bum): ra byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po thod pa nyid dben pa'i phyir+ya byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid gro 'di med/
25b2('bum): pa bIr byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa 'dri med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stod pa
25b3('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo ba
25b4('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// na nyid rtsong pa nyid kyi phyir
25b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
25b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po
25b7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// dbus mi dmigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
26a1('bum): ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin pa chen po stong pa nyid nge bonyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
26a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang
26a3('bum): yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
26a4('bum): dang ga dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
26a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong
26a6('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa
26a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ra'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
26b1('bum): byang chub sems dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dum pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyidadi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
26b2('bum): dbus su ma rigs so// don dam pa stong panyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bzod med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbras su mi
26b3('bum): dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
26b4('bum): bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
26b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
26b6('bum): gnan ma yin/ phye ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / de na rab pa spong pa rid
26b7('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
27a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' bang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa
27a2('bum): shA ra ti'i thug 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i drir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rngon rgyu byar re
27a3('bum): dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
27a4('bum): dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
27a5('bum): dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
27a6('bum): mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
27a7('bum): so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
27b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyidi stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa'i drung ba nyid meng pa
27b2('bum): lanasngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// 'dus byas
27b3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa yang gsan ma yin/ 'dus pas stong pa nyid ngo nga thaMd med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
27b4('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa
27b5('bum): nyid dben pa zung yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
27b6('bum): dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
27b7('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong panyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mo migs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
28a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i
28a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' byo ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthur mi migs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben
28a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa
28a4('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i
28a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
28a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
28a7('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
28b1('bum): 'dus pa bus stong pa nyid bzhid med pa'ang gzhanam yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi ma pa' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma mthu yang gzhan ma yin/ dbras kyang gzhan ma yinas/
28b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas
28b3('bum): spyod pa nyid ngo bo 'di med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' byang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' bang yin pa dang / dbus grang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su
28b4('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong
28b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
28b6('bum): mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub me ldang pa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
28b7('bum): so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
29a1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyidadi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong
29a2('bum): pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa
29a3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
29a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de
29a5('bum): bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthu' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa
29a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//
29a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
29b1('bum): mnga' las 'das parjod papa'i stong panyid pa yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa'i dben pa yang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid nga babad med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chu ba sems dpa'
29b2('bum): nga yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / bu ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su rang de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma ches
29b3('bum): bstong pa nyid med pa'i'o phor byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha
29b4('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thob ma
29b5('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang za ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa dri kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' po ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// thog
29b6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
29b7('bum): thob pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// thob pa dang tha sa med pa stong pa'id stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// thog
30a1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
30a2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
30a3('bum): pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med
30a4('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med
30a5('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
30a6('bum): bu na de ltar na thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog/
30a7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams
30b1('bum): ba byung banyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor bamed pa stong pa nyidi stod pa
30b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med
30b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
30b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med par
30b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa 'di stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
30b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
30b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyidi med pa dang / dor bamed pa stong pa 'di stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa
31a1('bum): dang / dor ba med pastong pa nyid batshad red pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mid rigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba rnyed
